Welcome To Saad Associates

 

If you wish to buy or sell a property whether it be residential or commercial, then you have come to right place. Saad Associates is a group of seasoned professionals having vast experience in this field, we guide our customers in making right investment decisions keeping in view their budget. Creating great value for our clients, fast response time and professional service are key values we focus on. Our advisory on investments is backed by sound market analysis and immense experience of our team. Huge number of clientele and their success stories in is a testimonial of value we create for our customers. Get a free consultation now to make your dreams become a reality!

Following are core values of our team and the way of conducting business:

  • Quality: We aim to exceed expectations in everything we do.
  • Integrity: We conduct ourselves in the highest ethical standards, demonstrating honesty and fairness in every decision and action.
  • Agility: We execute expeditiously to address our clients’ needs.
  • Courage: We make decisions and act in the best interests of our clients.
  • Respect & Trust: We make decisions and act in the best interests of our clients
Office Location
Our Services

Real Estate Consultancy

Team of more than 30 specialists dedicated primarily for our local & overseas customers helping them making correct investment decisions, supporting in acquisition and disposal of properties. The team provide end to end services to our customers including but not limited to transfers, registry and any legal requirements involved for transaction.

Sales & Marketing

Team of more than 30 specialists dedicated primarily for our local & overseas customers helping them making correct investment decisions, supporting in acquisition and disposal of properties. The team provide end to end services to our customers including but not limited to transfers, registry and any legal requirements involved for transaction.

Property Management

To facilitate our customers, Saad Associates manage their properties including but not limited of payment and collection of rentals, installments, upkeep, repair & maintenance of properties and management of tenants.
